entry.title: Fanael/highlight-quoted
entry.summary:
Highlight Lisp quotes and quoted symbols

Highlight quoted minor mode for Emacs

Activate it through a hook

(add-hook 'emacs-lisp-mode-hook 'highlight-quoted-mode)
